placement.cautious: balance all pressure >0 first, then priority

help:
1. wf: weight function/metric. i.e. Threat-perception. Use only the last two. 
2. Sequence of enumerating sublists of priority list. See priority-alg.js. Use only the last two. 
3. Placement in priority lists to balance pressure with threshold t. 
cautious: balance all your priority pressure > 0 first, then extra +t for priority 
tactical: priority pressure >t +=t repeatedly. 
4. Pressure threshold at target to init attack. Also used in keeping cards: rusher: always trade in when can, threshold = 2. 
carry: accumulate forces and attack when likely to win.
